channel.title: PortForwarding help, CO-OWNER REWARD
channel.description:
[size=14pt][u][b]CO-OWNER IN MY SERVER TO ANYONE WHO SUCCESSFULLY HELPS ME GET THE SERVER ONLINE. [/b][/u][/size]
My Run file:
[code] @echo off title GhostedPK java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server
-XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:
+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server; .\AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar pause [/code]
My compiler:
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-
1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d
bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src
\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players
\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server
\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java; .\AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar pause[/code]
Where am I supposed to put the file???? My [PI] base has everything differently setup in terms of where files are located..
It's the [PI] source from Ambientx's tutorial.
Currently I have my file in : C:\Users\Kleber\Downloads\Deception\Project Insanity Kleber\Project Insanity Server\Project Insanity Server\src\server\AllGoFreePortforwarding.jar
When I compile I get this error:
[code]javac: invalid flag: src\server\world\map\*.java; Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
SO!
If you successfully help me port forward, and I get the server up and running, I will GLADLY give you co-owner status.
I have Skype, and I can get TeamViewer.
-Kleber

item.title: PortForwarding help, CO-OWNER REWARD
item.dc:creator: @kleber883 kleber883
item.description:
@kleber883 wrote:

Get Blitz:

Do you have a router?

get blitz: I have an “Apple Express BaseStation”

Not to be confused with the “Apple Extreme BaseStation”

It hooks directly to ethernet, and sends wireless signals to our computers. it’s mac based.
is that a router?? you tell me!

iiLovePVP:

i can help through teamviewer

do so…

Pmed u teamviewer stuff

Read full topic

@demps2k9 wrote:

item.title: PortForwarding help, CO-OWNER REWARD
item.dc:creator: @kleber883 kleber883
item.description:
@kleber883 wrote:

demps2k9:

I will portforward for you through teamviewer.

Can you intruct me on what to do through teamviewer? or through skype?

I’ll start the teamviewer download now… do you want co-owner if you succeed?

DannyC:

Zomg??? a 317??? and you don’t portforward through source files rofl.

Lol, no, but this method you need to port forward through source files, because I have an apple router on windows, and it doesn’t support direct port forwarding…

Read full topic

item.title: PortForwarding help, CO-OWNER REWARD
item.dc:creator: @kleber883 kleber883
item.description:
@kleber883 wrote:

DannyC:

DUDE ILL HELP ITS BEEN MY DREAMTOBECOOWNEROFSOMEONEWHOCANTPORTFORWARD

LOL! Believe me, I’ve had quite a lot of experience in port forwarding, but this isn’t regular port forwarding.

This is port forwarding through a 317, with a Apple router, on a window operating system.

To make matters worse the source files are screwed up, as I’m not familar with [PI]

I can code, and I will be determined to make this a great server if someone decides to help…

Read full topic

item.title: PortForwarding help, CO-OWNER REWARD
item.dc:creator: @kleber883 kleber883
item.description:
@kleber883 wrote:

[size=14pt]CO-OWNER IN MY SERVER TO ANYONE WHO SUCCESSFULLY HELPS ME GET THE SERVER ONLINE. [/size]

My Run file:

@echo off
title GhostedPK
java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server 

-XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:

+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server; .\AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar
pause

My compiler:

[code]@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-

1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d

bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src

\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players

\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server

\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java; .\AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar
pause[/code]

Where am I supposed to put the file???
My [PI] base has everything differently setup in terms of where files are located…

It’s the [PI] source from Ambientx’s tutorial.

Currently I have my file in : C:\Users\Kleber\Downloads\Deception\Project Insanity Kleber\Project Insanity Server\Project Insanity Server\src\server\AllGoFreePortforwarding.jar

When I compile I get this error:

javac: invalid flag: src\server\world\map\*.java; Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .

SO!

If you successfully help me port forward, and I get the server up and running, I will GLADLY give you co-owner status.

I have Skype, and I can get TeamViewer.

-Kleber
